MatchedRegion.transcript: Hello, my name is Yang Junjie.

MatchedRegion.Text: Yuxiang Yang1, Junjie Yang1, Yufei Xu2 , Jing Zhang2, Long Lan³ , Dacheng Tao4,2 1 Hangzhou Dianzi University, China 2 The University of Sydney, Australia 3 National University of Defense Technology, China 4 JD Explore Academy, China

MatchedRegion.transcript: In the next few minutes, please let me introduce our work, APT36K, a large-scale benchmark for animal pose estimation and tracking.

MatchedRegion.Text: APT-36K: A Large-scale Benchmark for Animal Pose Estimation and Tracking
